lines.text: We talk but we never say anything.
Hippies. They're all hippies. They all look alike.

[Narrating]
I worry about Carrie. But I don't miss her. I no longer think about her as my daughter. I just hope that she's alright. Now I run. Run from my life but I can't run from my dreams. I can control my life. I can't control my dreams.
I am a guest in your house. It would be impossible for me to lie.
The truth is not in what you do but in what you run from.
The more repulsive it looks, the more you'll enjoy it.
Am I supposed to be turned on by all this?
No, of course not. I am.
Where'd you learn to cook spaghetti?
Um, right down here, right down here in the Pitts. Learned out of need. This is... what's... I don't... it's not al dente. What's the opposite of al dente?
Wrong. Well, that's probably the way it is.
It's the only grounds for divorce in Italy.
